HomePage.subtitle: Come celebrate our wedding
HomePage.InvitationText: Please join Marie-Lie and Victor on September 26, 2026 as we celebrate our wedding
HomePage.Ceremony-description: The ceremony will take place at the beautiful Davis Manor. Join us to celebrate this special moment.
HomePage.Cocktail-description: Enjoy an elegant cocktail with delicious drinks and appetizers.
HomePage.Reception-description: Join us for an evening of dancing, dining, and celebration.
HomePage.SweetMessage: Thank you for being with us for this beautiful event. Your love and support mean a lot to us, and we look forward to celebrating this moment with you.

Q1.question: What is the dress code?
Q1.answer: The dress code is semi-formal. We want you to feel comfortable and enjoy the day with us. Please wear something that makes you feel good.

Q2.question: Can I bring a guest?
Q2.answer: We would love to meet your partner. Please let us know if you are bringing a guest by filling out the RSVP form.

Q3.question: Can I bring my children?
Q3.answer: We love children! Please let us know if you are bringing your children by filling out the RSVP form.

Q4.question: What is the parking situation?
Q4.answer: There are plenty of parking spaces available on site. Please let us know if you need special accommodations.

Q5.question: What is the gift policy?
Q5.answer: Your presence is the best gift we could ask for. If you wish to give us something, we have a wedding registry at Amazon and Bed Bath & Beyond.

Q6.question: Can I take photos?
Q6.answer: We would love for you to take photos and share them with us. Please use the hashtag #MaireLieAndVictorWedding to share your memories with us.

RsvpPage.title: Confirm your attendance
RsvpPage.subtitle: We look forward to celebrating with you!
RsvpPage.name: Name
RsvpPage.stayingOnsite: Are you staying on site? If so, at which accommodation

StoryPage.title: Our Story
StoryPage.subtitle: Every love story is beautiful, but ours is our favorite. Here's how our journey began.

Event1.title: First Meeting
Event1.description: We first met at a mutual friend's party. Little did we know, this chance encounter would change our lives forever.

Event2.title: First Date
Event2.description: Our first official date was at a cozy coffee shop downtown. We talked for hours and knew there was something special between us.

Event3.title: Moving In Together
Event3.description: We decided to take the next step and move in together. Building our home together brought us even closer.

Event4.title: The Proposal
Event4.description: During a romantic trip to the mountains, Victor proposed. Of course, Marie-Lie said yes!

Event5.title: Our Wedding Day
Event5.description: We can't wait to celebrate our love with all of you on our special day!
